resources.string: This update is a fix to the Radisson, SK radar location and to add several new locations for the Vancouver BC area! So very sorry, I spend most of my time writing papers about lakes as a Ph.D. student. I know about the widget update problems on new versions of Android, which can sometimes be fixed by allowing Canada Weather extra permissions in the settings for Android or various battery defenders. The update to fix that for good will come a bit later. Thanks for all your kind emails and bug reports and feature requests. As always, keep it coming to apps@fishandwhistle.net.
